summary: TAKATA RECALL- MY SON HAS RECEIVED AN INITIAL REPLACEMENT ON THE DRIVER'S SIDE AIR BAG. THERE WAS A FIX BEFORE THE PART WAS AVAILABLE FOR THE DRIVER'S SIDE. HOWEVER, THE PASSENGER SIDE AIRBAG REMAINS A RISK TO ANY PASSENGER THAT RIDES WITH HIM. THERE IS CURRENTLY NO FIX AVAILABLE. THE RECALL BEGAN IN JUNE 2016 FOR THE PASSENGER SIDE AIRBAG. I DO NOT WANT ANY OF HIS SIBLINGS OR FRIENDS RIDING IN THIS VEHICLE UNTIL IT IS SAFE.
